column13: This year, we developed an emissions reduction plan to begin implementation from 1 July 2023. The plan focuses on three fundamental principles: 1. Strong governance: A coordinated response to climate change with clear accountability. 2. Quality data: Accurate data to track progress and measure our impact. 3. Education and engagement: Climate literacy among our global team to effectively tackle emissions reduction opportunities that rely on employee decisions and behavioural change.
